Title: Peter Five Eight
Produced by: Michael Zaiko Hall Fred Chavez Jet Jandreau John Lerchen
Starring:
Kevin Spacey 
 Rebecca De Mornay 
 Jet Jandreau 
 Jake Weber
Production companies: Ascent Films Mad Honey Productions LTD Films Forever Safe Productions
Production: Filming occurred in Siskiyou County, California in September 2021.  As of May 2022, the film has been completed.
Release: Peter Five Eight was released in the United States on March 22, 2024.
